summary: REQ-14’s Yes-branch follow-up message in `SuccessModal.tsx` was updated to the exact required string without the word “white”. However, the diff also includes changes to project metadata/summary files that were not requested as part of this text-only update.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state summary to mention the Yes-branch message update.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to update the Yes-branch follow-up UI text; it does not request updating project state tracking files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added detailed frontend file summaries describing UI behavior/visuals (including references to white tulips/lilies).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for documentation or summary-file updates; it is a text-only UI change request.
